TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

Docs.summary: Represents the collection of extensibility elements used by the XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection can either contain instances of classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>, or instances of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class. In a derived class, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification. Use these in your <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection> if you know in advance the type of extensibility element you want to make. Use an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> when you do not know the format of an element in advance.
## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks Since many of the classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description> namespace expose an `Extensions` property representing a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>, the constructor assigns a parent object corresponding to the level within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) hierarchy where the current `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection` is nested. For more information about WSDL, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification.

The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified to the at the specified zero-based index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `extension` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
